hero.about: I'm Jonas Dias. Determination and consistency in studies have shaped my journey as a developer. Proficient in Java, Spring Boot, and React, I am currently pursuing the 6th semester of Systems Analysis and Development at IFBA. Enthusiastic about learning and continuously growing, I'm ready to tackle challenges and contribute with quality and efficiency to development projects.

stringhini.title: Data Quality at Stringhini
stringhini.description: As the Data Quality, my responsibilities include recording, identifying, and categorizing products within the company's system. Additionally, I am committed to ensuring the integrity and accuracy of information.

about.description1: Hello! I'm Jonas, a technology enthusiast and developer specializing in Java, Spring Boot, and React. With extensive experience in web application development and a strong commitment to excellence, I'm constantly seeking challenges that drive my professional growth.
about.description2: To me, technology goes beyond codes and algorithms. It's the art of finding innovative solutions to complex problems. I'm always exploring new creative ways to approach challenges and pursue exceptional results.
about.description3: I'm excited to collaborate with talented teams on challenging projects, where my experience and passion for continuous learning can add value.

note_cards.title: Note Cards
note_cards.description: I utilized the development of Note Cards to enhance my technical skills, integrating the backend developed with Java and Spring Boot, and the frontend with React and TypeScript. It was both challenging and enjoyable to acquire new knowledge throughout the process.

tech_store.title: Tech Store
tech_store.description: Developing the project was extremely challenging, especially because I chose to learn Angular during the process. Additionally, I sought to apply the principles of clean architecture cohesively to the backend, developed with Java and Spring Boot. Furthermore, I used Docker to containerize the entire project, which added complexity but also significantly facilitated the deployment process.

web_chat.title: Web Chat
web_chat.description: A WebSocket chat application using Node.js, allowing users to connect and chat in real-time.

link_aggregator.title: Link Aggregator
link_aggregator.description: A webpage created to centralize my links using HTML, CSS, and JS, perfect for sharing a variety of links in a simple and personalized way.

unit_tests.title: Unit Tests
unit_tests.description: This project was used for me to learn how to implement unit tests using JUnit and Mockito in a Spring Boot environment.

progress_track.title: Progress Track
progress_track.description: This project, led by Micael Mota in collaboration with his YouTube followers, aims to develop a goal monitoring tool. In it, I contributed by improving the login interface and implemented the goal editing functionality.
